refseq_id.comment: Specification of refseq_id is mutually exclusive with specification of reference_sequence.

reference_sequence.comment: Specification of reference_sequence is mutually exclusive with specification of refseq_id.

rsid.title: RS Identifier
rsid.description: An NCBI assigned reference SNP cluster ID for the variant.

chromosome.title: Chromosome
chromosome.description: The number (or letter) designation for the chromosome, e.g. chr1 or chrX. May also specify the variant is in the mitochondrial DNA (chrM).

refseq_id.title: RefSeq Sequence Identifier
refseq_id.description: The RefSeq sequence identifier for the sequence this variant is located in.
refseq_id.comment: If there is no RefSeq sequence identifier available for the sequence this variant is located in, 'reference_sequence' should be submitted instead.

reference_sequence.title: Reference Sequence
reference_sequence.description: The reference sequence for the sequence this variant is located in.
reference_sequence.comment: This should only be submitted if there is no RefSeq sequence identifier available for submission.

items.description: Genome-wide association studies this variant was listed in and selected from.
items.comment: This should be submitted as the accession number of the GWAS from the NHGRI-EBI Catalog of human genome-wide association studies.
